settings.text:
Hey there! I'm Scott Horton from the small town of Thorp in Wisconsin. At 21, I headed out to Mesa, Arizona and got my hands dirty working for a fire sprinkler company. That was the start.

Two years in, things changed, the company merged, and jobs got a bit scarce. So, I linked up with a solid crew back in Wisconsin in 2010.

For the next 13 years, we went all over the U.S., setting up fire sprinkler systems – from big commercial sites to cold storages and food plants.

Now, here's where it gets interesting. We used this fastener, the Fab-Lok®, to install brackets onto those Insulated Metal Panel (IMP) walls.

But dang, those things were a pain! Needed three different tools and, if you've tried it, you know how tricky it gets inside unistrut.

So I thought, "There's got to be a better way." That's when I crafted a single, badass tool designed especially for unistrut. Made our lives a whole lot easier.

That's the heart and soul behind H-Ton Tools LLC.

We're here to make the tough jobs simpler. Let's build better, together.
